answers.answer: I had my test yesterday they drew blood three times all an hour after each other. Where I live they only administer the test once and its a two hour test. I should find out the results tomorrow when I go in for my 28 week check up.
I dont want to go for 3hrs "/ and i gotta be fasting.... How can they torture pregnant girls like that? Lol
I did mine today I had diabetes last pregnancy so fingers crossed this time I'll find out tomorrow when they ring :-)

I did mine today. They drew blood 4 times, once when you first get there and then once an hour every hour for 3 hours after you drink the drink. The stuff you have to drink this time is even harder to keep down than the 1 hour test bc it has twice the amount of sugar so its super sweet. I had to send my boyfriend to get me some ice chips. It helped me not feel so naseated. Hope all you ladies get good results!

I wasn't feeling very good after the first hour so the hospital took me to a room where I could lay down on a hospital bed. It helped me get through the test otherwise I think I may have gotten sick and they said that if i got sick I would have to come back another day to take the test again I was not about to do that lol.

question: Last month i took the 1 hour diabetes test and today for my 30 week apmnt, they rold  me that i was only 3% high so i have to go back and do a 3 hrs tedt..... Ugh. Thats a long time!!
title: diabetes test.
